text: فَلَمَّا جَاوَزَا قَالَ لِفَتَىٰهُ ءَاتِنَا غَدَآءَنَا لَقَدْ لَقِينَا مِن سَفَرِنَا هَـٰذَا نَصَبًا

translation.en.sahih: So when they had passed beyond it, [Moses] said to his boy, "Bring us our morning meal. We have certainly suffered in this, our journey, [much] fatigue."
translation.id.indonesian: Maka tatkala mereka berjalan lebih jauh, berkatalah Musa kepada muridnya: "Bawalah kemari makanan kita; sesungguhnya kita telah merasa letih karena perjalanan kita ini".
